description: Cameron from MIA: Men in Action... And, strangely enough, our boy Cameron didn't jump up and run ... but rather kinda just submitted. And the wild and raw bareback fucking that Cameron takes is out of this world. His party buddy gives him no mercy as he takes Cameron's virgin hole like a man and fucks our boy almost retarded. The way it all unfolds is so hot to watch as we witness the usually very 'in control' Cameron become submissive and let his buddy have his way with his ass. I thought I was dreaming as I stood there with the camera away from my eye just watching the action. I couldn't believe what I was seeing ...
title: Cameron
